reviewText:
This instructional DVD has been designed and created by an experienced computer instructor and adult services librarian.

The "Help for the Computer Shy" line of instructional videos are the author's "computer help classes in a box".

The author provides step-by-step video demonstrations for using iPhoto 08 to Edit, Retouch, Import and Share Your Digital Photos

The viewer will also learn how to "upload" their digital photos to the popular "Flickr" website.

NOTE: This computer help DVD can be played on computers with DVD drives and on regular television sets with DVD players.

Free updates to this DVD will be posted on the author's website.
